body_html:
Thanks @suharshs! We're planning to move away from queues and provide first-class support for multi-epoch processing in the redesigned input pipeline API. As a result, I doubt that we will add these features to the queues directly, but instead we'll make it easy to get a signal between epochs in the new API.

I'm going to close this issue for now. Please feel free to comment on #7951 if there are particular features that you'd particularly like to see or other use cases that you'd like us to support in the new API!

body:
Thanks @suharshs! We're planning to move away from queues and provide first-class support for multi-epoch processing in the redesigned input pipeline API. As a result, I doubt that we will add these features to the queues directly, but instead we'll make it easy to get a signal between epochs in the new API.

I'm going to close this issue for now. Please feel free to comment on #7951 if there are particular features that you'd particularly like to see or other use cases that you'd like us to support in the new API!
